thread.title: Son of Storage Wars: Miami star charged with murdering a family friend during viewing party

title: Son of Storage Wars: Miami star charged with murdering a family friend during viewing party
text:
Son of Storage Wars: Miami star charged with murdering a family friend during viewing party - WMBFNews.com, Myrtle Beach/Florence SC, Weather Member Center: Son of Storage Wars: Miami star charged with murdering a family friend during viewing party Updated: Son of Storage Wars: Miami star charged with murdering a family friend during viewing party Hashim Pew, the son of Storage Wars: Miami star Kevin Pew, has been charged with first-degree murder after he allegedly shot and killed a family friend during a viewing party, the Sun Sentinel reports. More >> Hashim Pew, the son of Storage Wars: Miami star Kevin Pew, has been charged with first-degree murder after he allegedly shot and killed a family friend during a viewing party, the Sun Sentinel reports. More >> Petticoat Junction star Pat Woodell dies at 71 Pat Woodell, who played Bobbie Jo Bradley on the 1960s sitcom Petticoat Junction, died of cancer on Sept. 29 at her home in Fallbrook, Calif., The Associated Press reports. She was 71. More >> Pat Woodell, who played Bobbie Jo Bradley on the 1960s sitcom Petticoat Junction, died of cancer on Sept. 29 at her home in Fallbrook, Calif., The Associated Press reports. She was 71. More >> Khloe Kardashian has finally broken her silence about her estranged husband Lamar Odom's recent hospitalization. More >> 
By Liz Raftery, 
Hashim Pew, the son of Storage Wars: Miami star Kevin Pew , has been charged with first-degree murder after he allegedly shot and killed a family friend during a viewing party, the Sun Sentinel reports. 
Hashim and Kevin Pew were at a viewing party in Florida to watch the show on Oct. 13 when Hashim, 23, allegedly shot and killed Janel Hamilton, 19, according to the Sun Sentinel . Authorities are still trying to determine a motive for the shooting. The party was being held at the Pew family's townhouse, where Hashim and his mother were living. Hamilton, who is the goddaughter of Hashim's mother and had recently returned from attending high school in England, was staying at the house. 
Police were called to the home around 10 p.m. and arrested Hashim, who is charged with premeditated murder. They recovered a .45-caliber handgun from the scene, which had been stolen during a 2008 burglary in central Florida, according to the Sun Sentinel .
